summary: A troubled young man retreats from the big city and his ex-wife for the tranquility of a small town. He is drawn into a relationship with a young woman whose boyfriend goes missing, leaving the new arrival as a suspect.
cast: Paddy Considine|Julia Stiles|Karl Pruner|Phillip MacKenzie|Gord Rand|James Gilbert|R.D. Reid|Caroline Dhavernas|Alex Karzis|Marcia Laskowski|Krista Bridges|Charlotte Sullivan|Robbie Campbell|Jennifer Kydd|Dru Viergever|Peter MacNeill|Jonah Allison|Brian Bisson|Arnold Pinnock|Bruce McFee|Nicholas Campbell|Jimmy Byron|Chris Gillett|Sarah Podemski|Maria Ricossa
title: The Cry of the Owl
